reviewText: Unbelievably basic, do not purchase if you've played at any decent level

I have been coach for the last three years and bought this DVD set to add more variety to the number of drills that I include in my practices. I wasn't expecting so many different drills and the different areas they cover, they practically cover everything: shooting, basic and advanced footwork, passing, dribbling, running, heading, you name it, this dvd set is for all levels.
I usually combine few drills from each dvd to have more complete practice sessions. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Riveting drills that come at you fast! Have the remote handy so you can rewind,
slow mo and freeze the action. Wonderful philosophy! No one stands around.
Get as many players involved in every drill with maximum repetitions.
Might lack some pure technique but make no mistake, this is pure soccer fun for
players, coaches, parents and leagues! Highly recommended!
I have enjoyed the set of soccer DVD's.  This set is great and a wonderful variety of skills and information.  Helpful in practices and in games.  Love that some are advanced also.

All six titles have content that soccer coaches have to be able to utilize. There must be over 200 drills here. Some new, some not but most of all presented professionally. No question about it, guaranteed improvement for your team and players when put into use. These popular soccer titles by Marty Schupak are also available on Amazon's Video On Demand program for as low as $2.99. Championship Soccer Drills Backyard Soccer Drills 34 Soccer Goalie Drills Soccer Shooting Drills Soccer Fast Footwork Drills Advanced Soccer Drills

From recreational soccer to the most competitive high school programs,
these DVDs are the standard as far as the best in quality drills.
The techniques discussed are first rate. Professionally put together, our league
has used all six soccer programs for the past two years and have seen success and improvement.
SCHUPAK's SOCCER 6 PACK DVD SET should be included in any soccer program that
sincerely is looking for quality soccer resources!

These six soccer DVDs are perfect for all types of leagues!
Absolutely no regrets on the purchase. The drills and techniques were
first rate throughout each program.
Improvement is a guarantee!

Six high quality soccer DVDs make up this set. What distinguishes these DVDs from others is the video production combined with drills that the first year soccer coach as well as the coach of the most competitive teams will use.
I was impressed how in each video it keeps your interest by not spending more than 45-60 seconds on any one drill. There is less talk and more action. The technique portion also gives a lot of good information.
Soccer coaches looking for content to use with their team will help themselves with this set.
HIGHLY IMPRESSIVE!

These six DVDs will give you over 200 useful drills. From ball handling, shooting, goalkeeping to fun games and more. This set has it all.
VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
